text: The 1968–71 Nordic Football Championship was the 10th Nordic Football Championship. Four Nordic countries were in the tournament, Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. Sweden ended up winning their 8th title. == Results == Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Sweden 12 10 2 0 32 10 +22 22 Denmark 12 4 3 5 21 16 +5 11 Norway 12 4 3 5 19 25 –6 11 Finland 12 0 4 8 10 31 –21 4 == References == Category:Nordic Football Championship Category:1970s in Sweden Category:1970s in Denmark Category:1970s in Norway Category:1970s in Finland Category:1968 in European football Category:1969 in association football Category:1970 in association football Category:1971 in European sport Category:1971 in association football Category:1969 in Europe Category:1970 in Europe
title: 1968–71 Nordic Football Championship
